actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to extend relocation assistance to persons displaced as the result of real property acquisitions by private persons for federally assisted programs or projects.

summary.text: Requires any person who acquires or who has acquired property as of the effective date of the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 for any program for which such person received Federal financial assistance and thereby displaces another person to make all relocation payments and provide all assistance required of a State agency by such Act as if the relocation was caused by such State agency under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to extend relocation assistance to persons displaced as the result of real property acquisitions by private persons for federally assisted programs or projects.
